column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Eventsandparticipants | Event # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I was very excited to go visit my friend in the city .
#id=2
#text=I needed to take a bus there so I went online the night before to plan my route .
#id=3
#text=My parents dropped me off at the bus stop and i went to the ticket machine to get a Metrocard .
#id=4
#text=I sat down on a bench and waited for the bus to arrive .
#id=5
#text=After a few minutes the big bus arrived and opened its doors .
#id=6
#text=As I walked up the stairs I said hello to the bus driver .
#id=7
#text=I took out my Metrocard and swiped it in the slot .
#id=8
#text=I asked the driver how long until my stop and he said it was the fifth stop and would take about forty minutes .
#id=9
#text=After forty minutes it was time for me to get off the bus .
#text=the bus driver told me to have a good day and I got off the bus .
#text=I could see my friend Mickey waving to me across the street .
